clinical_history: Limb swelling, rule out deep venous thrombosis.
technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Breast tissue shows hypoechoic lesion measuring 5.05 mm.
Uterus appears homogeneous; endometrial thickness measures 7.73 mm.
Common bile duct measures 7.16 mm, within normal limits.
Placenta is hyperechoic and normally located.
Thyroid gland shows well-defined echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Testes are homogeneous with normal vascularity.
